name: Warp Racer
description:
Race against time to get the best score you can!

controls:  Move- wasd/arrows. 

                      Warp- space bar/left mouse button. 

Game play: Pick up rings to increase your multiplier and refill your warp bar.

                          Smash through asteroids while warping for bonus points and to increase your multiplier.  At regular speeds asteroids will destroy your ship. 

                          Avoid beams. They are certain death.
